surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

catalog_ra.name: catalog_ra
catalog_ra.description: Right Ascension of measured object center (J2000) as given in the input catalog (NSA for main samples and most ancillaries)

catalog_dec.name: catalog_dec
catalog_dec.description: Declination of measured object center (J2000) as given in the input catalog (NSA for main samples and most ancillaries)

nsa_zdist.name: nsa_zdist
nsa_zdist.description: Distance estimate using pecular velocity model of Willick et al. (1997), expressed as a redshift equivalent; multiply by c/H0 for Mpc (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_mass.name: nsa_elpetro_mass
nsa_elpetro_mass.description: Stellar mass from K-correction fit (use with caution) for elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_f.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_f
nsa_elpetro_absmag_f.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame GALEX far-UV, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_n.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_n
nsa_elpetro_absmag_n.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame GALEX near-UV, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_u.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_u
nsa_elpetro_absmag_u.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS u-band, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_g.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_g
nsa_elpetro_absmag_g.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS g-band, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_r.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_r
nsa_elpetro_absmag_r.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS r-band, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_i.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_i
nsa_elpetro_absmag_i.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS i-band, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_absmag_z.name: nsa_elpetro_absmag_z
nsa_elpetro_absmag_z.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS z-band, from elliptical Petrosian fluxes (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_f.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_f
nsa_elpetro_flux_f.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in GALEX far-UV (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_n.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_n
nsa_elpetro_flux_n.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in GALEX near-UV (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_u.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_u
nsa_elpetro_flux_u.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS u-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_g.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_g
nsa_elpetro_flux_g.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS g-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_r.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_r
nsa_elpetro_flux_r.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS r-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_i.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_i
nsa_elpetro_flux_i.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS i-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_flux_z.name: nsa_elpetro_flux_z
nsa_elpetro_flux_z.description: Elliptical SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS z-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_r_original.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_r_original
nsa_elpetro_th50_r_original.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS r-band (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_f.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_f
nsa_elpetro_th50_f.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in GALEX far-UV (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_n.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_n
nsa_elpetro_th50_n.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in GALEX near-UV (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_u.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_u
nsa_elpetro_th50_u.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS u-band (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_g.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_g
nsa_elpetro_th50_g.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS g-band (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_r.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_r
nsa_elpetro_th50_r.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS r-band (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_i.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_i
nsa_elpetro_th50_i.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS i-band (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_th50_z.name: nsa_elpetro_th50_z
nsa_elpetro_th50_z.description: Elliptical Petrosian 50% light radius in SDSS z-band (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_phi.name: nsa_elpetro_phi
nsa_elpetro_phi.description: Position angle (east of north) used for elliptical apertures (for this version, same as ba90) (NSA)

nsa_elpetro_ba.name: nsa_elpetro_ba
nsa_elpetro_ba.description: Axis ratio used for elliptical apertures (for this version, same as ba90) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_mass.name: nsa_sersic_mass
nsa_sersic_mass.description: Stellar mass from K-correction fit (use with caution) for Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_f.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_f
nsa_sersic_absmag_f.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame GALEX near-UV, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_n.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_n
nsa_sersic_absmag_n.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame GALEX far-UV, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_u.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_u
nsa_sersic_absmag_u.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS u-band, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_g.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_g
nsa_sersic_absmag_g.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS g-band, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_r.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_r
nsa_sersic_absmag_r.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS r-band, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_i.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_i
nsa_sersic_absmag_i.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS i-band, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_absmag_z.name: nsa_sersic_absmag_z
nsa_sersic_absmag_z.description: Absolute magnitude in rest-frame SDSS z-band, from Sersic fluxes (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_f.name: nsa_sersic_flux_f
nsa_sersic_flux_f.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in GALEX far-UV (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_n.name: nsa_sersic_flux_n
nsa_sersic_flux_n.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in GALEX near-UV (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_u.name: nsa_sersic_flux_u
nsa_sersic_flux_u.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in SDSS u-band (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_g.name: nsa_sersic_flux_g
nsa_sersic_flux_g.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in SDSS g-band (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_r.name: nsa_sersic_flux_r
nsa_sersic_flux_r.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in SDSS r-band (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_i.name: nsa_sersic_flux_i
nsa_sersic_flux_i.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in SDSS i-band (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_flux_z.name: nsa_sersic_flux_z
nsa_sersic_flux_z.description: Two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit flux in SDSS z-band (fit using r-band structural parameters) (NSA)

nsa_sersic_th50.name: nsa_sersic_th50
nsa_sersic_th50.description: 50% light radius of two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit to r-band (NSA)

nsa_sersic_phi.name: nsa_sersic_phi
nsa_sersic_phi.description: Angle (E of N) of major axis in two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band (NSA)

nsa_sersic_ba.name: nsa_sersic_ba
nsa_sersic_ba.description: Axis ratio b/a from two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band (NSA)

nsa_sersic_n.name: nsa_sersic_n
nsa_sersic_n.description: Sersic index from two-dimensional, single-component Sersic fit in r-band (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_f.name: nsa_petro_flux_f
nsa_petro_flux_f.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in GALEX far-UV (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_n.name: nsa_petro_flux_n
nsa_petro_flux_n.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in GALEX far-UV (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_u.name: nsa_petro_flux_u
nsa_petro_flux_u.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS u-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_g.name: nsa_petro_flux_g
nsa_petro_flux_g.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS g-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_r.name: nsa_petro_flux_r
nsa_petro_flux_r.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS r-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_i.name: nsa_petro_flux_i
nsa_petro_flux_i.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS i-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_flux_z.name: nsa_petro_flux_z
nsa_petro_flux_z.description: Azimuthally-averaged SDSS-style Petrosian flux in SDSS z-band (using r-band aperture) (NSA)

nsa_petro_th50.name: nsa_petro_th50
nsa_petro_th50.description: Azimuthally averaged SDSS-style Petrosian 50% light radius (derived from r band) (NSA)

nsa_extinction_f.name: nsa_extinction_f
nsa_extinction_f.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in GALEX far-UV (NSA)

nsa_extinction_n.name: nsa_extinction_n
nsa_extinction_n.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in GALEX near-UV (NSA)

nsa_extinction_u.name: nsa_extinction_u
nsa_extinction_u.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in SDSS u-band (NSA)

nsa_extinction_g.name: nsa_extinction_g
nsa_extinction_g.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in SDSS g-band (NSA)

nsa_extinction_r.name: nsa_extinction_r
nsa_extinction_r.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in SDSS r-band (NSA)

nsa_extinction_i.name: nsa_extinction_i
nsa_extinction_i.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in SDSS i-band (NSA)

nsa_extinction_z.name: nsa_extinction_z
nsa_extinction_z.description: Galactic extinction from Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1997), in SDSS z-band (NSA)

nsa_subdir.name: nsa_subdir
nsa_subdir.description: Subdirectory for images in the NSA 'detect' directory (NSA)

nsa_pid.name: nsa_pid
nsa_pid.description: Parent id within mosaic for this object (NSA)

nsa_nsaid.name: nsa_nsaid
nsa_nsaid.description: Unique ID within NSA v1 catalog (NSA)

catind.name: catind
catind.description: Zero-indexed row within the input NSA v1 catalog (NSA)

manga_target1.name: manga_target1
manga_target1.description: Targeting bitmask for main sample targets

mangaid.name: mangaid
mangaid.description: Unique ID for each manga target

zmin.name: zmin
zmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary sample

zmax.name: zmax
zmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary sample

szmin.name: szmin
szmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Secondary sample

szmax.name: szmax
szmax.description: The maximum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Secondary sample

ezmin.name: ezmin
ezmin.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary+ sample

ezmax.name: ezmax
ezmax.description: The minimum redshift at which the galaxy could still have been included in the Primary+ sample

probs.name: probs
probs.description: The probability that a Secondary sample galaxy is included after down-sampling. For galaxies not in the Secondary sample PROBS is set to the mean down-sampling probability

pweight.name: pweight
pweight.description: The volume weight for the Primary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

sweight.name: sweight
sweight.description: The volume weight for the full Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

srweight.name: srweight
srweight.description: The volume weight for the down-sampled Secondary sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

eweight.name: eweight
eweight.description: The volume weight for the Primary+ sample. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

psrweight.name: psrweight
psrweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

esrweight.name: esrweight
esrweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary+ and down-sampled Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

psweight.name: psweight
psweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

esweight.name: esweight
esweight.description: The volume weight for the combined Primary+ and full Secondary samples. Corrects the MaNGA selection to a volume limited sample

ranflag.name: ranflag
ranflag.description: Set to 1 if a target is to be included after random sampling to produce the correct proportions of each sample, otherwise 0

manga_tileids_0.name: manga_tileids_0
manga_tileids_0.description: IDs of all tiles that overlap a galaxy's position.

manga_tileid.name: manga_tileid
manga_tileid.description: The ID of the tile to which this object has been allocated

tilera.name: tilera
tilera.description: The Right Ascension (J2000) of the tile to which this object has been allocated

tiledec.name: tiledec
tiledec.description: The Declination (J2000) of the tile to which this object has been allocated

ifutargetsize.name: ifutargetsize
ifutargetsize.description: The ideal IFU size for this object. The intended IFU size is equal to IFUTargetSize except if IFUTargetSize > 127 when it is 127, or < 19 when it is 19

ifudesignwrongsize.name: ifudesignwrongsize
ifudesignwrongsize.description: The allocated IFU size if the intended IFU size was not available

ifu_ra.name: ifu_ra
ifu_ra.description: The Right Ascension (J2000) of the IFU center

ifu_dec.name: ifu_dec
ifu_dec.description: The Right Declination (J2000) of the IFU center

badphotflag.name: badphotflag
badphotflag.description: Set to 1 if target has been visually inspected to have bad photometry and should not be observed

starflag.name: starflag
starflag.description: Set to 1 if target lies close to a bright star should not be observed

object_ra.name: object_ra
object_ra.description: The best estimate of the Right Ascension (J2000) of the center of the object. Normally the same as CATALOG_RA but can be modified particularly as a result of visual inspection

object_dec.name: object_dec
object_dec.description: The best estimate of the Declination (J2000) of the center of the object. Normally the same as CATALOG_RA but can be modified particularly as a result of visual inspection

obsflag.name: obsflag
obsflag.description: Set to 1 if the target has already been included on a plate set to be observed at the time the IFU allocation was made, otherwise 0

catindanc.name: catindanc
catindanc.description: Zero-indexed row within the applicable ancillary catalog

ifudesignsizemain.name: ifudesignsizemain
ifudesignsizemain.description: The allocated IFU size prior to the addition of the ancillary samples (0 = "unallocated")

ifuminsizeanc.name: ifuminsizeanc
ifuminsizeanc.description: The minimum acceptable IFU size for the ancillary program

ifutargsizeanc.name: ifutargsizeanc
ifutargsizeanc.description: The ideal IFU size for the ancillary program

manga_target3.name: manga_target3
manga_target3.description: Targeting bitmask for the ancillary samples

priorityanc.name: priorityanc
priorityanc.description: The ancillary program's priority for this object

unalloc.name: unalloc
unalloc.description: Set to 1 if an ancillary target has been allocated an IFU the was not allocated to a main sample galaxy, otherwise 0

specobjid.name: specobjid
specobjid.description: The associated specObjID from the dr19_sdss_dr17_specobj table
